personal.name: Pratik Kumar
personal.title: Full Stack Developer & UI/UX Designer
personal.bio: I'm a passionate full-stack developer and designer with over 4 years of experience creating digital solutions that make a difference. My journey began with a curiosity about how things work, which led me to explore the fascinating world of technology and design.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: React-based task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time updates, and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Brand Identity Design
projects.description: Complete brand identity package for a tech startup including logo design, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines.

projects.title: Mobile Banking App
projects.description: UI/UX design for a modern mobile banking application with focus on security, usability, and accessibility.

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time weather dashboard with interactive maps, forecasts, and location-based weather alerts.

projects.title: Restaurant Website
projects.description: Modern restaurant website design with online reservation system and menu showcase.

experience.description: Lead development of web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Mentor junior developers and collaborate with design teams.
Created user interfaces and experiences for mobile and web applications. Conducted user research and usability testing.
